title: Let's Play Gravity Rush 2 - Kinda Funny Plays E3 2016
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Greg plays Gravity Rush 2 at E3 2016!

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy

transcript_chunks.text: Let's Play Gravity Rush 2 is happening, Kinda Funny is going all out with Let's Plays and reaction videos all week long. Subscribe now at youtube.com/kindafunnygames to not miss a thing. Oh hi there everybody, it's me Greg Miller, and this is a let's play on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames of Gravity Rush 2. I'm going to turn around now and play it; you can still hear me though. You see this? We got this cat Sid - you remember them from the first game, Cat of course, our superhero. We play as Syd, that cop who ended up coming out with us. He always had like he had the hots for us; we knew it, but we didn't engage. I don't think they've engaged here or anything. Uh, we're moving in Gravity Rush 2 to a new spot here - Jirard's easier to read the word sometimes than it is. It's the same um, we're going to get to play through fight a bunch of stuff, but I was just talking to our good friend Nick - you remember Nick? He was on Beyond once or twice about some of the differences in the game, and for him, a big one was

fight a bunch of stuff but I was just talking to our good friend Nick, you remember Nick, he was on Beyond once or twice uh about some of the differences in the game and for him a big one was the color palette that Gravity Rush 2 is very blue and you can already see that here obviously with the blue sky but if you remember Gravity Rush one it was that green and brown palette now what I like to point out is look at how like her clothes are like rippling in the wind when you talk about like what this game can do that the Vita couldn't uh more things are happening in town more little effects like that and we got airbats coming into the port, prepare the ropes in a seagull uh but yeah if you haven't ever seen a Gravity Rush before I don't know what your problem is, Gravity Rush one was good on Vita and then they put out an HD remaster of it uh and I shouldn't say good on Vita I think I gave it a 75 at the time on IGN if I'm being 100% honest but it was good that was when we were

amazing on Vita and then they put on HD remaster of it uh and I shouldn't say amazing on Vita I think I gave it a 75 at the time on IGN if I'm being 100% honest but it was good that was when we were still in the 20 point scale so it probably would have gotten a little bit higher than that uh this is Cat, she's our superhero you can see her little pantaloons blown in the wind you see how great this place looks but of course Cat is a superhero she can fly it's amazing this is what the game's all about I liked it I like Gravity Rush one because it was a superhero origin story uh there were little things I wanted them to do better uh I don't know if that's really necessarily the fact here we'll learn as we go but I'm definitely glad they got another shot at it cuz I did enjoy the game oh bad guys beat the hell out of these guys but Gravity Rush two is here coming out in 2016 yeah that's right it's this year sometime what date we don't know yet they won't tell us but it's here it's prettier
